title: Fragment, 4th–5th century
medium:
Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Weft; S-spun linen. S-spun wools.
Technique: slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping
description: Polychrome band with a flower growing from a vase with two addorsed birds. Above, a three part plant with volutes over a heart-shaped form.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 4th–5th century.
4th–5th century. Medium: Warp; S-spun linen. Weft; S-spun linen. S-spun wools.
Technique: slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-76.
